scripts.test: npm run test-mocha && npm run test-jest && npm run test-integration
scripts.test-jest: if ( node-version-gte-6 ); then jest --config test/jest/jest.config.js; fi
scripts.travis: npm test && npm run lint && npm run coverage && (<coverage/lcov.info coveralls || true)
scripts.coverage: NODE_ENV=development nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=text --all -- npm run coverage-test && echo google-chrome coverage/lcov-report/index.html
scripts.coverage-test: npm run test-mocha && JEST=false npm run test-integration
